sentences.sContent: The redoubtable American woman played her part.
sentences.sContent_eng: The redoubtable American woman played her part.
sentences.sCn: 可敬的美国妇女作出了其贡献。

sentences.sContent: A strong continuity of tradition and custom had guided the redoubtable islanders of the far east across the centuries .
sentences.sContent_eng: A strong continuity of tradition and custom had guided the redoubtable islanders of the far east across the centuries .
sentences.sCn: 传统和习俗的牢固延续，曾经引导这些可畏的远东岛民度过许多世纪。

remMethod.val: re (反复) + doubt (疑虑) + able → 千古奇案， 疑云迭起 → 可怕的
